DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to verify the existence of bacterial and/or fungal contamination during different technics of propofol with or without EDTA continuous infusion in patients undergoing general anesthesia.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Bacterial and Fungal Contamination During Propofol Continuous Infusion
DOC.criteria: Age eighteen years old or more ASA Physiological Status P1 ou P2 Patients undergoing clean procedure under general anesthesia. Patients under eighteen years old ASA Physiological Status P3, P4 or P5 Current infectious process
